    • Method Detail

      • buildConnection

        public static HttpsURLConnection buildConnection(String requestType)
        Builds a connection to TAXII server
        Parameters:
        requestType - String containing "poll" or "inbox" for poll requests or inbox requests, respectively
        Returns:
        HttpsURLConnection object connected to TAXII server

      • generateMsgId

        private static String generateMsgId()
        Generate a message ID
        Returns:
        a String containing a UUID

      • inboxMessage

        public static Document inboxMessage(String msgId,
                    String resultId,
                    HashMap<String,String> extHdrs,
                    String destCollectionName,
                    String message,
                    HashMap<String,String> sourceSubscription,
                    TaxiiUtil.RecordCount recordCount,
                    List<ContentBlock> contentBlocks)
        Constructs a TAXII Inbox_Message XML message and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        resultId - the result_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers
        destCollectionName - the destination collection name
        message - text for the Message tag
        sourceSubscription - a HashMap containing all Source_Subscription attributes and tags (collection_name, Subscription_ID, Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp, Inclusive_End_Timestamp)
        recordCount - a RecordCount object containing info for the Record_Count tag
        contentBlocks - an ArrayList of ContentBlock objects Usage Example: Document im = inboxMessage("12345", null, "Here is my message", null, contentBlocks);

      • pollRequest

        public static Document pollRequest(String msgId,
                   String cN,
                   String subId,
                   HashMap<String,String> extHdrs,
                   String ebt,
                   String iet)
        Constructs a TAXII Poll_Request XML message (with Subscription_ID) and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        cN - the collection name
        subId - the subscription_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        ebt - the Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp value
        iet - the Inclusive_End_Timestamp value Usage Example: Document pr = pollRequest("12345", "myCollection", "12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef", null, "2014-05-24T22:23:00.000000Z", null);

      • pollRequest

        public static Document pollRequest(String msgId,
                   String cN,
                   HashMap<String,String> extHdrs,
                   String ebt,
                   String iet,
                   TaxiiUtil.PollParameters pp)
        Constructs a TAXII Poll_Request XML message (with Poll_Parameters) and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        cN - the collection name
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        ebt - the Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp value
        iet - the Inclusive_End_Timestamp value Usage Example: Document pr = pollRequest("12345", "myCollection", null, "2014-05-24T22:23:00.000000Z", null);
